titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I finished the Glasgow sermon. After lunch I went to Medomsley, & confirmed 70 persons. Parr, the parson, is an eccentric, but good pastor. Then I went on to Blackhill, & there confirmed 150 persons. After the service I returned to Auckland.
